article.title: Status and history for Fulfulde, Nigerian [fuv2]
article.para: No known problems at this time.

history.history-entry: OHCHR identifies the language as Fulaar, while it credits the [fuv] entry with Guinean translation, which means that the [fuv] entry is actually in Pulaar [fuc], while the [fuv2] entry is in Nigerian Fulfulde. Removed the superfluous '(2)' here. Thanks to Adam Twardoch.
stage 4: OHCHR identified as the source, conversion to XML thanks to Eric Muller.
